text: Ichi ndi chifukwa chakuti kunadza kwa iwo Atumwi amene adali ndi zizindikiro zooneka koma iwo adati: “Kodi ife tizitsogozedwa ndi anthu anzathu?” Kotero iwo sanakhulupilire ndipo anabwerera m’mbuyo. Koma Mulungu sasowa kanthu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi Mwini wa chilichonse ndi Mwini ulemerero wonse. Al Taghabun
